note: This is a structured state compression engine, NOT general quantum simulation
honest_limitations: Operates on separable, φ-structured states ONLY
O(N) claims only valid for this restricted family
what_this_actually_is: Efficient compression of φ-structured, separable state families
O(N log N) unitary transform (same class as FFT)
Integration with RFT-based signal processing stack
publication_note: Claims must be scoped to structured states only, not general quantum
